body_html:
@SsnL
How do i change
"${TORCH_SRC_DIR}/csrc/autograd/generated/python_nn_functions.cpp"
line to using python3?
I am using ppc64le4, CUDA 8.0.61-1, CuDNN 6.0, NVIDIA P100, Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.4 (Maipo)
getting

make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack nccl caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD c10d'

Edit: This is the exact errors after which it starts to fail.

CMake Error at c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/pytorch/torch/lib/build/c10d/test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir//./c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o


make[2]: *** [test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir/c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir/all] Error 2

and eventually ends up at

make[2]: *** [example/allreduce] Error 1
make[1]: *** [example/CMakeFiles/allreduce.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack nccl caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d'

Does it have to do something with the fact that it is accessing cuDNN v7.1.4 from CUDA v9.0?

body:
@SsnL 
How do i change 
` "${TORCH_SRC_DIR}/csrc/autograd/generated/python_nn_functions.cpp"`
line to using python3?
I am using ppc64le4, CUDA 8.0.61-1, CuDNN 6.0, NVIDIA P100, Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.4 (Maipo)
getting 
```
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack nccl caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD c10d'
```


Edit: This is the exact errors after which it starts to fail.

```
CMake Error at c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o.Release.cmake:219 (message):
  Error generating
  /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/pytorch/torch/lib/build/c10d/test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir//./c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o


make[2]: *** [test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir/c10d_cuda_test_generated_CUDATest.cu.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [test/CMakeFiles/c10d_cuda_test.dir/all] Error 2
```

and eventually ends up at

```
make[2]: *** [example/allreduce] Error 1
make[1]: *** [example/CMakeFiles/allreduce.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack nccl caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d'
```

Does it have to do something with the fact that it is accessing cuDNN v7.1.4 from CUDA v9.0?
